additionalDescription: Contains a minority of labelled data and a majority of unlabelled data. Includes accelerometer data. Includes two birds vocalisations, one male, and one female
annotationsType: Onset and offset of vocalisations, individuals
description:
A multi-modal dataset containing recordings of an adult male and female Zebra
Finch bird using a microphone and two accelerometer sensors. The dataset
consists of eleven data files of 1 hr. duration each, out of which three are
densely annotated, and eight are unlabelled. Each file contains data from a
microphone (audio) and two accelerometers (body vibration) channels. The data
in all channels are sampled at a rate of 24000 Hz.

Link to paper (IEEE Xplore):
<https://ieeexplore.ieee.org/abstract/document/10094650>

Link to paper (arxiV): <https://arxiv.org/pdf/2211.09376.pdf>

Link to dataset: <https://doi.org/10.5281/zenodo.7253729>

**Cite as:**  Kumar, S., Anshuman, B., Ruttimann, L., Hahnloser, R.H. and
Arora, V., 2023, June. Balanced Deep CCA for Bird Vocalization Detection. In
_ICASSP 2023-2023 IEEE International Conference on Acoustics, Speech and
Signal Processing (ICASSP)_  (pp. 1-5). IEEE.
name: TwoRadioBirds
